title: Error using create_labeled_video- scorer was not used
body:
Hi, i am using deeplabcut on jupyter notebook, ubuntu 16.04


**Describe the problem**
I have labeled and trained a network successfully, analyzed the video using the trained network but when using the function "create_labeled_video" i get the following error

"Starting %  /home/orel/panasonicDemo/none-orel-2019-03-14/videos ['/home/orel/panasonicDemo/none-orel-2019-03-14/videos/secondVideo.mp4']
Loading  /home/orel/panasonicDemo/none-orel-2019-03-14/videos/secondVideo.mp4 and data.
The video was not analyzed with this scorer: DeepCut_resnet50_noneMar14shuffle1_150000
No other scorers were found, please use the function 'analyze_videos' first."

However, I did use the 'analyze_video" function on the same video, for which i got the following message:
"The videos are analyzed. Now your research can truly start! 
 You can create labeled videos with 'create_labeled_video'.
If the tracking is not satisfactory for some videos, consider expanding the training set. You can use the function 'extract_outlier_frames' to extract any outlier frames!"

would appreciate you assistance

The config.yaml file for the project is the following:
# Project definitions (do not edit)
Task: none
scorer: orel
date: Mar14

# Project path (change when moving around)
project_path: /home/orel/panasonicDemo/none-orel-2019-03-14

# Annotation data set configuration (and individual video cropping parameters)
video_sets:
  /home/orel/panasonicDemo/none-orel-2019-03-14/videos/secondVideo.MP4:
    crop: 0, 1920, 0, 1080
bodyparts:
- Head1
- Head2
- Head3
- Back1
- Back2
- Tailbase
- ForepawR
- HindpawR
- ForepawL
- HindpawL
start: 0
stop: 1
numframes2pick: 500

# Plotting configuration
pcutoff: 0.1
dotsize: 12
alphavalue: 0.7
colormap: hsv

# Training,Evaluation and Analysis configuration
TrainingFraction:
- 0.95
iteration: 0
resnet: 50
snapshotindex: -1
batch_size: 4

# Cropping Parameters (for analysis and outlier frame detection)
cropping: false
#if cropping is true for analysis, then set the values here:
x1: 0
x2: 640
y1: 277
y2: 624

# Refinement configuration (parameters from annotation dataset configuration also relevant in this stage)
corner2move2:
- 50
- 50
move2corner: true
